pizza.description1: Available in traditional hand tossed or Detroit style (10"x14")
pizza.description2: Dough options: Flour or Gluten Free for 3.00 extra

column1.name: Your Own Creation
column1.description: We'll take the Cheese Pizza % add toppings of your choice! (Price per topping)

column1.name: Cheese
column1.description: Pure, whole milk mozzarella cheese & our own tomato sauce. That’s it! Not a plain cheese pizza, a great pizza!

column1.name: Bennidito’s Original Pesto
column1.description: Olive oil & fresh garlic sauce topped with fontina, mozzarella & ricotta cheese, fresh red peppers & rings of pesto. Spokane’s favorite pesto pie!

column1.description: Red sauce, mozzarella cheese, sun-dried tomatoes, spinach, roasted garlic & goat cheese

column1.description: Red sauce, mozzarella cheese, with generous toppings of fresh tomatoes, mushrooms, green peppers, onions & black olives

bySlice.description1: No salad substitutions - mixed greens only
